   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to MPyNode's documentation!
===================================

MPyNode simplifies all the technical overhead required by MPxNode, allowing users to easily develop nodes with Maya's Python API.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
